title: S14 Ep97: Ancient Gods or Ancient Aliens
itunes:title: Ancient Gods or Ancient Aliens
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS climbs Mt. Olympus to find out the age old riddle, Ancient Gods or Ancient Aliens with guest Hercules Invictus!

True to his adopted name, Hercules is a follower of the ancient aliens theory, and believes that the Greek gods of Olympus are still present here concealing themselves behind masks more suited to our modern times. They reside in underground threshold and from time to time venture out in their fiery chariots (UFOS) and even interact with the locals.

Visit our guests site here: www.HerculesInvictus.net

Visit our store front for the books, documentaries and more you hear featured on our show: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

AND WATCH THE HOLZER FILES ON TRAVEL CHANNEL EVERY THURSDAY NIGHT!

https://www.travelchannel.com/shows/holzer-files

Support our sponsors for great deals!
